text: The 2015 BWF Para-Badminton World Championships was held from 10 to 13 September 2015 in Stoke Mandeville, England. ==Participating countries== 232 athletes from 36 countries participated in this edition of Para-Badminton World Championships. * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==Medalists== ===Men's events=== {| |- |rowspan=2|Singles WH1 |rowspan=2|
